original_title: Full Blossom: The Life of Poet/Actor Roberts Blossom
overview: Full Blossom: The Life Of Poet/Actor Roberts Blossom takes a look at Blossom's work onscreen, as well as the man behind the camera, examining his political and spiritual convictions, his belief in reincarnation (Blossom is certain his son was Michelangelo in a previous life), his career as a poet, and his relationship with his family.
title: Full Blossom: The Life of Poet/Actor Roberts Blossom
